thread.section_title: Sammydress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Sammydress 的点评意见 | sammydress.com
thread.title: JK

author: JK
title: JK
text:
Went to buy my GF a hoodie for Christmas. The Item never came, the tracking was janky. My item never came. I had been in communication with them for months for a simple refund of 15.00 no bid deal. It was a nightmare to deal with customer service and FOUR months later they finally attempt to resolve this issue by offering me a 50% refund. Then blaming me for the issue. That's insulting.
8.00 that's all they had to give up to make things right. But no they wanted to make money of of giving me nothing. The quality of their items look so bootlegged I wouldn't be surprised if the hoodie costed them a 1.50 to make. So they profited of of giving me nothing. I walked away from Sammydress feeling punished for doing business with them.
